item.text: Then I looked, and here was the Lamb standing on Mount Zion, and with him were 144,000, who had his name and his Father’s name written on their foreheads.

I <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> a <st data-num="5456" class="">sound</st><n id="1" /> coming <st data-num="1537" class="">out of</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="5456" class="">sound</st> of <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">waters</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="5456" class="">sound</st> of <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="1027" class="">thunder</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="5456" class="">sound</st> I <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> was <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> that made by <st data-num="2790" class="">harpists</st> <st data-num="2789" class="">playing</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2788" class="">harps</st>,
and they were singing a new song before the throne and before the four living creatures and the elders. No one was able to learn the song except the 144,000 who had been redeemed from the earth.

These are the ones who have not defiled themselves with women, for they are virgins. These are the ones who follow the Lamb wherever he goes. These were redeemed from humanity as firstfruits to God and to the Lamb,
and no lie was found on their lips; they are blameless.
Then I saw another angel flying directly overhead, and he had an eternal gospel to proclaim to those who live on the earth—to every nation, tribe, language, and people.
He declared in a loud voice: “Fear God and give him glory because the hour of his judgment has arrived, and worship the one who made heaven and earth, the sea and the springs of water!”
A second angel followed the first, declaring: “Fallen, fallen is Babylon the great city! She made all the nations drink of the wine of her immoral passion.”
A third angel followed the first two, declaring in a loud voice: “If anyone worships the beast and his image, and takes the mark on his forehead or his hand,

<st data-num="846" class="">that person</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> of the <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st> of <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="2372" class="">anger</st><n id="2" /> that has been <st data-num="2767" class="">mixed</st> <st data-num="194" class="">undiluted</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4221" class="">cup</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3709" class="">wrath</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he will be <st data-num="928" class="">tortured</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2303" class="">sulfur</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1799" class="">in front of</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">in front of</st> the <st data-num="721" class="">Lamb</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="2586" class="">smoke</st> from <st data-num="846" class="">their</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="929" class="">torture</st> will <st data-num="305">go up</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519 165">forever</st> and <st data-num="165" class="">ever</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those who <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st> the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1504" class="">image</st> will <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="372" class="">rest</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st>, along with<n id="4" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> who <st data-num="2983" class="">receives</st> the <st data-num="5480" class="">mark</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>.”
This requires the steadfast endurance of the saints—those who obey God’s commandments and hold to their faith in Jesus.

Then I heard a voice from heaven say, “Write this:

‘Blessed are the dead,

those who die in the Lord from this moment on!’”

“Yes,” says the Spirit, “so they can rest from their hard work, because their deeds will follow them.”
Then I looked, and a white cloud appeared, and seated on the cloud was one like a son of man! He had a golden crown on his head and a sharp sickle in his hand.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> <st data-num="1831">came out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st>, <st data-num="2896" class="">shouting</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> to the one <st data-num="2521" class="">seated</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3507" class="">cloud</st>, “<st data-num="3992" class="">Use</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1407" class="">sickle</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> start to <st data-num="2325" class="">reap</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="5610" class="">time</st> to <st data-num="2325" class="">reap</st> has <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">since</st> the <st data-num="1093">earth’s</st> <st data-num="2326" class="">harvest</st> is <st data-num="3583" class="">ripe</st>!”
So the one seated on the cloud swung his sickle over the earth, and the earth was reaped.
Then another angel came out of the temple in heaven, and he, too, had a sharp sickle.

<st data-num="243" class="">Another</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st>, who <st data-num="2192" class="">was</st> in <st data-num="1849" class="">charge</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">of</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>, <st data-num="1831" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2379" class="">altar</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5455" class="">called</st> in a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> to <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> angel<n id="3" /> who <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3691" class="">sharp</st> <st data-num="1407" class="">sickle</st>, “<st data-num="3992">Use</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3691" class="">sharp</st> <st data-num="1407" class="">sickle</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5166" class="">gather</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1009">clusters of grapes</st><n id="6" /> off <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="288" class="">vine</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>,<n id="7" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="4718" class="">grapes</st><n id="8" /> <st data-num="187">are now ripe</st>.”<n id="9" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> <st data-num="906" class="">swung</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1407" class="">sickle</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">over</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5166" class="">gathered</st> the <st data-num="288">grapes from the vineyard</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="906" class="">tossed</st> them <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3025" class="">winepress</st> of the <st data-num="2372" class="">wrath</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.
Then the winepress was stomped outside the city, and blood poured out of the winepress up to the height of horses’ bridles for a distance of almost 200 miles.
